TEXT: CARDINAL . Mr PERSON , an officer in the revenue police , lives in GPE ( GPE ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE he instituted proceedings in the Consiglio di Stato for judicial review of a decision of ORG assigning him to a rank lower than the one to which he considered himself to be entitled . He also sought a stay of execution of that decision .
CARDINAL . In a decision of CARDINAL DATE the PERSON allowed the application for a stay of execution . After a hearing on DATE the PERSON ordered ORG to produce various documents .
CARDINAL . In a judgment of DATE , the text of which was deposited with the registry on DATE , the PERSON gave judgment against the applicant .
